annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: The plugin is already starting, and another connect request was received.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: The plugin is already connected, and another connect request was received.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: The plugin is already stopping, and another stop request was received.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: The plugin is already stopped, and another disconnect request was received.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: The request could not be processed because the VPN plugin is in the wrong state for this type of request.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: The request could not be processed because it contained malformed arguments, or arguments of unexpected type. It usually means that one of the VPN setting data items or secrets was not of the expected type (i.e. int, string, bool, etc).

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: A binary providing the service failed to launch.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: The request could not be processed because the connection was invalid. It usually means that the connection's VPN setting was missing some required data item or secret.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: The request could not be processed because the plugin does not support interactive operations, such as ConnectInteractive() or NewSecrets().
